title: My Great Big Live Wedding with David Tutera
overview: Wedding and party planner extraordinaire David Tutera takes his talents to TV once more with Lifetime's My Great Big Live Wedding with David Tutera. And this time, he's pushing the envelope even furtherâ€”each episode will be a live broadcast!. According to the network, "Every week, one new couple will share their emotional and heart-warming story live from a different city across the country." Thinkfactory Media, Lifetime, and Tutera "scoured the country and found eight inspirational couples whose remarkable stories of love and survival redefine real love."
